Blog.post: Oi,oi... Estou aqui no Arena 2 conversando com o meu amigo Fabio, estamos falando de nossas vidinhas...

Oi,oi...... urlLink Não sei como colocar imagens nesta droga... Até parece que eu tô aprendendo a escrever de novo. Saco!! Só dá pra colocar figura se eu copiar do meu outro blogg ou se eu copiar de algum site para blogs... Fazer o quê? Ailtinho em breve vai poder estar postando também, é só uma questão de ele ter um endereço de email... Te amo amorzinho... urlLink
Oi,oi este é o primeiro post do meu mais novo blogg. Com a participação do meu amorzinho Ailton também... urlLink
Oi,oi... Acho que agora vai poder aparecer o comentário...
Oi,oi... Achei um site beleza : urlLink Gay bar urlLink Punk kittens

Oi,oi... Ailton... Milhões de beijos pra vc amor... Indeed. A seguir, uma música do Linkin que eu só consegui baixar por causa do kazaa. Linkin Park - Adema Giving in Will you, walk me To the edge again Shaking, lonely, and I am drinking again Woke up tonight and no one's here with me I'm giving in to you Take me under I'm giving in to you I'm dying tonight I'm giving in to you Watch me crumble I'm giving in to you I'm crying tonight I'm giving in to you Caught up, in life Losing all my friends Family has tried, to heal all my addictions Tragic it seems, to be alone again I'm giving in to you Take me under I'm giving in to you I'm dying tonight I'm giving in to you Watch me crumble I'm giving in to you I'm crying tonight I'm giving in to you (Oh fuck) I look forward, to dying tonight Drinks still on myself, life's harder every day The stress has got me I'm giving in Giving Giving in now! Take me under (I'm killing all the faith) I'm dying tonight (I'm sick of all that faith) Watch me crumble (I'm killing all the faith) I'm crying tonight I'm giving in to you Take me under I'm giving in to you I'm dying tonight I'm giving in to you Watch me crumble I'm giving in to you I'm crying tonight I'm giving in to you Take me under I'm giving in to you I'm dying tonight I'm giving in to you Blessed be...

Oi,oi... Boa tarde!!! Pra vcs, a letra da música do Audioslave... Enjoy it... Like a stone - Audioslave On a cobweb afternoon in a room full of emptiness by a freeway I confess I was lost in the pages of a book full of death reading how we'll die alone and if we’re good we’ll lay to rest Anywhere we want to go In your house I long to be room by room patiently I’ll wait for you there like a stone I’ll wait for you there alone and on my deathbed I will pray to the gods and the angels like a pagan to anyone who will take me to heaven to a place I recall I was there so long ago the sky was bruised the wine was bled and there you led me on (Chorus) And on I read Until the day was gone and I sat in regret of all the things I’ve done for all that I’ve blessed and all that I’ve wronged in dreams until my death I will wander on. Blessed be...

Well, I'm very glad cause my friend Mandy has passed in the contest PSC . On November 30 and on December 1 I will be doing the MACRO (UFAM 's vestibular). I intend to do Arts (English). So I hope I pass...

Oi,oi... Good morning!!! Yesterday I had a hard day... I worked my ass off + had to solve some problems with the system. Later at night, I could talk to my sweet heart. I was so tired... I love him so much!!!! And here you have the news about Maddy: MADONNA REMIXED & REVISITED - IN STORES NOW Madonna's new EP, Remixed & Revisited, is out today internationally (Monday, November 24th) and tomorrow in North America (Tuesday, November 25th). Pick it up at your local store or get it online. Track listing: * Nothing Fails (Nevins Mix) * Love Profusion (Headcleanr Rock Mix) * Nobody Knows Me (Mount Sims Old School Mix) * American Life (Headcleanr Rock Mix) * Like A Virgin/Hollywood Medley: featuring Christina Aguilera, Britney Spears & Missy Elliott – 2003 MTV VMA Performance * Into The Hollywood Groove (The Passengerz Mix): featuring Missy Elliott * Your Honesty (unreleased song)
Well, I miss my freedom (I mean, I would like to be living by myself again). Then I could go in and out whenever i want to.

Good afternoon Yesterday and today I had the Vestibular (UFAM), I didn't get much so I think I will not pass... Well, yesterday after the test I went home, had lunch with everybody and then Lilica came here to pick me up and teach her... Tinho was at home but he went out with his friends to play dominoes. :P Then me and Lissianne stayed home to watch some movies. We watched The planet of Apes and Signs too. Then my baby came back home and we watched the rest of the film, just the two of us cause Lilica had gone to her frinds house to pick her wallet which she had forgotten there in Gege's house. This morning I had the other test from Ufam which was BOMBASTIC!!! I didn't know anything about Physics nor even Chemistry, but for Geography and Biology I think I could make it... Lissianne has started a blogg for herself: urlLink Lilica's blog Click there and visit my sister-in-law's blogg!!! ;) Well, Ailtinho came to school to visit me this afternoon. I didn't know that I could fall in love again like this... And I love him... He's the sweetest thing ever. I hope we can stay together at least forever...

Oi,oi... Well, I'm still with this fucking flu. I've worked a lot and today I didn't even have a free time. I think that Mandy must be upset with me, cause I didn't go to her prom. I had forgotten about it... My honey didn't pick me up yesterday. I miss him...

Oi,oi... Well after some days sick, I got back, now with much more time for working (as usual). I was thinking of quitting my job, but i thought better then i decided not to leave it... My boss is in Manaus and we have talked a lot about the possibles changes that we are going to have this year... The real British kids is gonna start soon, and I will teach it... :) It will be cool cause i love to work with children and teens. Me and Ailtinho are together for almost three months already and I already love him a lot... XXXXX Well, it´s time to go now, I have to call my students. Blessed be...

Oi,oi... Well, yesterday was my birthday. I got some phone calls from my relatives and a few friends. Mommy, My mother-in-law, Michella, Samir, Mandy, Aunt Suelly, Alessandra and Adriana and then Lissianne. Ah, and of course my husband too. I haven't got any presents yet. Today is my Mom's birthday and I think I was the first one to wish her happy-birthday. And tomorrow will be a special dinner at my Mom's house. I just can't wait to watch Harry Potter's new film : The prisoner of Azkaban in the book is amazing and I hope that the version on the film is nice too. I will watch it with my husband and with Neca. Ah, by the way, yesterday Neca got disappeared for some hours, she had lost her bus card an then she couldn't come back home by bus. The problem was that she hadn't called and everybody at home got crazy. We thought that she had been stolen, or murdered, or something worse as she is an air-headed... But thank goodness, one of her friends from ICBEU took her home along with his parents. Ufffffs... Blessed be...

Oi,oi... Good night everybody. Well, It's been a while I haven't written here, but I'm back. I have just worked and sometimes I have been to the doctor too. My little daughter is already 6 months old of pregnancy and I''m looking forward to seeing the ultrasound exam again just to see how she is... I'm so happy. Blessed be...
